the code

open source

mdtoolkit is open source and in the public domain with a CC𝟶 license. The source code for the tools are available on GitHub.

Issues and questions related to the toolkit should be posted in the issues section of the appropriate repository. Alternatively, send an email to inquiries@mdeditor.org. Code contributions are welcome.
